author: arj
msg: Added Hypersonic embedded database for JDBC testing. Enabled JDBC testing in build.properties to use Hypersonic by default. Added license file; corrected file extensions of two others.

msg: The triviality of this bug fix is in inverse relation to the magnitude of my sense of shame in having let it persist for so long.
